mapper.sql: BUILD_ID buildId, PROJ_INFO_ID projInfoId, CERT_BUILD_CODE certBuildCode, CERT_BUILD_QRCODE certBuildQrcode, GOV_ORG_CODE govOrgCode, GOV_ORG_NAME govOrgName, PUBLISH_TIME publishTime, CONSTRUCTION_UNIT constructionUnit, PROJ_NAME projName, CONSTRUCTION_ADDR constructionAddr, CONSTRUCTIONS_SIZE constructionsSize, CONTRACT_PRICE contractPrice, KC_UNIT kcUnit, SJ_UNIT sjUnit, SG_UNIT sgUnit, JL_UNIT jlUnit, KC_UNIT_LEADER kcUnitLeader, SJ_UNIT_LEADER sjUnitLeader, SG_UNIT_LEADER sgUnitLeader, JL_UNIT_LEADER jlUnitLeader, CONTRACT_PERIOD contractPeriod, CERT_BUILD_MEMO certBuildMemo, CREATER creater, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFIER modifier, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId, PRINT_USER_ID printUserId, PRINT_USER_NAME printUserName, PRINT_TIME printTime, GCZCB_UNIT gczcbUnit, GCZCB_UNIT_LEADER gczcbUnitLeader
mapper.select:
update aea_ex_proj_cert_build
PROJ_INFO_ID = #{projInfoId},
CERT_BUILD_CODE = #{certBuildCode},
CERT_BUILD_QRCODE = #{certBuildQrcode},
GOV_ORG_CODE = #{govOrgCode},
GOV_ORG_NAME = #{govOrgName},
PUBLISH_TIME = #{publishTime},
CONSTRUCTION_UNIT = #{constructionUnit},
PROJ_NAME = #{projName},
CONSTRUCTION_ADDR = #{constructionAddr},
CONSTRUCTIONS_SIZE = #{constructionsSize},
CONTRACT_PRICE = #{contractPrice},
KC_UNIT = #{kcUnit},
SJ_UNIT = #{sjUnit},
SG_UNIT = #{sgUnit},
JL_UNIT = #{jlUnit},
KC_UNIT_LEADER = #{kcUnitLeader},
SJ_UNIT_LEADER = #{sjUnitLeader},
SG_UNIT_LEADER = #{sgUnitLeader},
JL_UNIT_LEADER = #{jlUnitLeader},
CONTRACT_PERIOD = #{contractPeriod},
CERT_BUILD_MEMO = #{certBuildMemo},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
PRINT_USER_ID = #{printUserId},
PRINT_USER_NAME = #{printUserName},
PRINT_TIME = #{printTime},
PRINT_TIME = #{gczcbUnit},
PRINT_TIME = #{gczcbUnitLeader}
where BUILD_ID = #{buildId}
